code: import{UPDATE_TRIP_PICKUP,UPDATE_TRIP_DROP,UPDATE_TRIP_CAR,UPDATE_SELECTED_POINT_TYPE,CLEAR_TRIP_POINTS}from"../store/types";export var updateTripPickup=function updateTripPickup(pickupAddress){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_TRIP_PICKUP,payload:pickupAddress});};};export var updateTripDrop=function updateTripDrop(dropAddress){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_TRIP_DROP,payload:dropAddress});};};export var updateTripCar=function updateTripCar(selectedCar){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_TRIP_CAR,payload:selectedCar});};};export var updatSelPointType=function updatSelPointType(selection){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_SELECTED_POINT_TYPE,payload:selection});};};export var clearTripPoints=function clearTripPoints(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CLEAR_TRIP_POINTS,payload:null});};};
